Module kivakit.component
Package com.telenav.kivakit.component

Interface ComponentMixin

All Superinterfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, Component, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.mixins.Mixin, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.registry.RegistryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.RepeaterMixin, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter
public interface ComponentMixin extends Component, com.telenav.kivakit.mixins.Mixin, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.RepeaterMixin
A mixin for Component which can be implemented by a class that already extends another base class.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
